description: Data providing the location, type and capacity of public and private community facilities in the Bronx, including schools, parks, libraries, public safety, day care, foster care, special needs housing, health and mental health facilities and programs. Refer to attached SelFac_datainfo.pdf for facility type designation and definitions.

metadata.description: The location, type and capacity of public and private community facilities in New York City, including schools, parks, libraries, public safety, day care, foster care, special needs housing, health and mental health facilities and programs. Refer to SelFac_datainfo.pdf for facility type designation and definition.

name: Bronx Facilities
